> TT:  Do I have to repeat myself?  Lower your shields.  I want in.
> 

{Panthos}

The panther silently crept up the last few feet to the group of 
signatures, having recognized one he had met earlier. His eyes 
flashed as a feline grin passed over his muzzle as he stalked from 
the under brush behind the bot.

"So we meet again... I assume like myself you gained some sort of 
invitation to this location?" He spoke, his voice slow and soft not 
to startle the rather volatile bot.
